summary: Overwhelmed widower Seth Webster is searching for a housekeeper to help him with his unruly six year old twin sons. "Mrs. Miracle" mysteriously appears and quickly becomes an irreplaceable nanny, chef, friend... and matchmaker.
cast: James Van Der Beek|Erin Karpluk|Doris Roberts|Michael Strusievici|Valin Shinyei|Chelah Horsdal|Johannah Newmarch|Wanda Cannon|Pat Waldron|Patti Allan|Pete Graham|Dolores Drake|Maggie Sullivun|Candus Churchill|Rikki Gagne|Gordon Tipple|Brittany Willacy|Almeera Jiwa|Dalila Bela
keywords: christmas|father son relationship|character name as title|housekeeper|twin
title: Milagro en casa
